items.sentence: Tom is sure that he'll be able to pass today's exam.
Tom is outside waiting for Mary to come pick him up.
Tom is going to have to tell Mary about what he did.
Tom is going to graduate from high school this year.
Tom hasn't yet been paid for the work he did for us.
Tom has never told me anything about his girlfriend.
Tom and three other people were here this afternoon.
I know you see it, but are you really looking at it?
I'm fairly certain that what we saw was an elephant.
I'm glad that Tom finally found himself a good home.
Tom couldn't bring himself to throw the letter away.
Tom is trying to make sure that everything is ready.
Tom told everyone at school about what had happened.
Don't believe people who claim they know everything.
Do you think Tom would do that if he had the chance?
Are you certain it was Tom who told Mary to do that?
My parents almost always speak French to each other.
The bus had already left when I got to the bus stop.
Actually it might be a good idea to start right now.
Did you know that some foxes lived on this mountain?
